text: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِمۖ بَلۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ ٱلۡجِنَّۖ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤۡمِنُونَ

translation.en: They will say, "Exalted are You! You, [O Allah], are our benefactor not them. Rather, they used to worship the jinn; most of them were believers in them
translation.id: (Para malaikat itu menjawab, "Mahasuci Engkau. Engkaulah pelindung kami, bukan mereka; bahkan mereka telah menyembah jin;700) kebanyakan mereka beriman kepada jin
